edu.isep.sixcolors.controller

Class GraphicInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.isep.sixcolors.controller.GraphicInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputInfo, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GraphicInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, OutputInfo
    GraphicInfo gets the necessary information for the main controller Play from the Graphic (swing) View and passes it onto Play. It implements ActionListener so it's called on a button press. It also implements OutputInfo to be able to be used in Play

      Constructor creates an instance of Play to use.

      • returnGameParamSet

        public void returnGameParamSet(java.lang.String sourceText,
                      int boardSize,
                      int playerNb,
                      java.lang.String[] playerName,
                      java.lang.String[] playerType,
                      java.lang.String sourceActionCommand)
        Function from the Interface OutputInfo, that sends the information from actionPerformed to the main controller Necessary step to assure a generic input to Play
        Specified by:
        returnGameParamSet in interface OutputInfo
        Parameters:
        sourceText - The text of the pressed button
        boardSize - The size of the board
        playerNb - The number of players
        playerName - A table of the player's names
        playerType - A table of the player' what the player is (what AI or human)
        sourceActionCommand - The text sent as an Action Command through the button, must not be mixed up with sourceText
